name: Brian Chesky
title: CEO & Co-founder
archetypeDescription: Believes every problem can be solved with better typography and a 47-slide deck about 'belonging'
flavor: Once redesigned an air mattress into a $100B company. Still thinks he could've made the mattress better.
bangerQuote: Your Figma skills are not a substitute for a business model, but damn if Brian didn't prove otherwise.
roastBullets: Turned 'strangers sleeping in your house' from a horror movie plot into a $100B company
Has definitely fired someone over font kerning
The only CEO who treats every all-hands like a TED talk about the meaning of human connection
Invented 'Founder Mode' because 'micromanaging with charisma' didn't fit on the blog post title
